name: @translatesutra/web-landing
description: TranslateSutra landing page and web interface

scripts.build: npm run copy-assets && npm run minify
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist && cp -r *.html *.css *.js assets dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.serve: python -m http.server 3001 2>/dev/null || python3 -m http.server 3001 2>/dev/null || npx serve -p 3001

author: TranslateSutra Team
